name: Astober
description:
Made in C & SDL2

This is a game I made using my engine in which I first modified the engine and  added particles and then made a small simple game just for fun and for the Devtober 2021 Game Jam.  The controls are the following:

  • Arrow Keys
  • Note, they get inverted as you hit the walls, for example, you hit the wall once and the left arrow, instead of moving you  to the left, it moves you to the right

Third Party Assets: m5x7 Font

GitHub Source: Devtober 2021
